function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of alternative contact methods for customers at closed retailers","Impact":"Loss of customer connection and communication during crisis","Mitigation":"Adding phone number, email, or social media to signs","Technologies":"Contact information display, digital signs","People":"Customers, small retailers","Owner":"Small retailers"},{"Description":"Inadequate crisis management planning for small retailers","Impact":"Inability to effectively communicate and operate during crisis","Mitigation":"Developing crisis management plans, training for communication","Technologies":"Communication software, digital communication tools","People":"Small retailers, small business organizations","Owner":"Small retailers"},{"Description":"Ineffective use of digital signs by multi-location retailers during pandemic","Impact":"Missed opportunity to provide customers with COVID-19 information","Mitigation":"Updating digital signs, integrating COVID-19 messaging","Technologies":"Digital sign software, content management systems","People":"Customers, multi-location retailers","Owner":"Multi-location retailers"}]}
